[Page Title: Hours & Location | Iron Rose Restaurant in Charleston, SC]

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
Hours & Location
115 Meeting Street, Charleston, SC 29401 843-805-1054 
Linger over an extended meal or drinks for breakfast, dinner or any time in-between.

Monday to Friday 7:30–10:30am
Breakfast 
Saturday & Sunday 8am–2pm
Brunch 
Monday to Friday 11:30am–2pm
Lunch 
Daily from 2–5pm
Bar Snacks 
Daily from 4-6pm
Happy Hour 
5–9pm with the bar open until 11pm
Dinner Sunday to Thursday 
5–10pm with the bar open until 1am
Weekend Dinner Friday & Saturday 
Reservations for up to parties of 8 can be made on or by calling our team at 843-805-1054. Please email us at for parties of 9 or more and for private dining options.
Resy dine@ironroserestaurant.com Get Directions 
Email Signup

[Page Title: Happenings | Iron Rose Restaurant in Charleston, SC]

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
Happenings

Come for the Southern flare—stay for the unforgettable atmosphere. From indulgent holiday menus to half-priced wine nights, live music, and exclusive seasonal events, every visit offers a taste of tradition with a flavorful twist.

Toast to Tuesdays!

Daily Happy Hour

Live Music Thursdays & Fridays

Weekend Brunch with Live Entertainment
Load More Events

[Page Title: Private Events | Iron Rose Restaurant | American Restaurant in Charleston, SC]

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
Events by Iron Rose
Slide 1 of 2 Slide 2 of 2 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Book Your Next Special Event

Inside the iconic Mills House Hotel, Iron Rose offers a stunning backdrop for unforgettable celebrations and gatherings, accommodating groups from 30 to 200 guests with Southern charm and style. Events By Iron Rose draws inspiration from the restaurant's Charleston-loved dinner menus and transforms them into a private dining experience, customizable to fit your every need, from cocktail receptions to plated dinners.
Inquire Now 
Iron Rose Buyout

Includes the courtyard, dining room, and bar. 200 Guests Reception | 3400 sqft
Inquire Now 
Iron Rose Courtyard

Our courtyard and grand fountain have all the charm and character you’d expect from a secret garden. Stunning, picture-perfect and classic Charleston.150 Guests Reception | 1,600 sq. ft.
Inquire Now 
Iron Rose Dining Room

Iron Rose features an expansive private dining room with dramatic architecture and glass doors that close.100 Guests Seated | 120 Guests Reception | 1,760 sq. ft.
Inquire Now 
Iron Rose Third Bay

For intimate gatherings, our semi-private third bay transforms to fit your dining needs.40 Guests Seated | 50 Guests Reception | 860 sqft
Inquire Now Inquire Now

[Page Title: Iron Rose Restaurant | American Restaurant in Charleston, SC]

Home
Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Slide 1 of 5 Slide 2 of 5 Slide 3 of 5 Slide 4 of 5 Slide 5 of 5 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Tucked inside our famous Pink Hotel, Iron Rose is the true spirit of Charleston, with dramatic architecture, an expansive dining room, elegant bar and outdoor fountain. This hidden gem welcomes locals and travelers alike to joyous celebrations and intimate gatherings, where our guests are delighted by tempting twists on Southern staples with locally-sourced ingredients and well-crafted cocktails. Named after the floral icon on wrought iron railings and gates that have protected Charleston’s hidden gardens since the Victorian era, the "Iron Rose" which celebrates craftsmanship, symbolism, and the rough made delicately beautiful.

Experience Our Cuisine

Browse our offerings for Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Cocktails and Weekend Brunch.
Menus 
Private Events

Iron Rose offers an expansive private dining room with dramatic architecture, a stunning courtyard and elegant bar. We were made for your joyous celebrations from wedding takeovers, to intimate dinners and lively receptions for up to 200 people.
Start Planning 
Happenings

There's always something special happening at Iron Rose. Join us for brunch with live music, half off bottles of wine on Tuesdays, events, holiday menus and more.
